thread.title: New Visa Debit Card with Financial Hills Latinoamérica
thread.title_full: New Visa Debit Card with Financial Hills Latinoamérica - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: New Visa Debit Card with Financial Hills Latinoamérica
text:
New Visa Debit Card with Financial Hills Latinoamérica
With this card you can make withdrawals at any ATM of the funds available in your account.
Madrid, Spain, September 01, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Visa and Financial Hills Latinoamérica (a subsidiary of Horizon Financial Bank) a provider of personal loans and certificates of deposit (CD) for the U.S. Hispanic market, Latinoamerica and Spain, has just launched a new debit card.
With this card you can make withdrawals at any ATM of the funds available in your accounts. According to its chief executive Sam Cameron, "You will immediately approve your account, order our debit card and can use. Access to any ATM in the U.S. and around the world is something that every customer expects to have.... this is something completely new for our customers, from whom we received very good reviews on this service," he said.
Financial Hills Latinoamerica, based in North Dakota and offices in Miami, with its new style of application and financial products online (www.financialhills.com) recently announced dividend payment to shareholders for the third consecutive term.
Apparently the focus on the Latin market in the United States and its product certificates of deposit (CD) for countries in Latinoamérica and Spain is giving very good results.
